S04n518:1: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-bhūtapūrvaṃ kumāra atīte'dhvanyasaṃkhyeye kalpe asaṃkhyeyatare vipule apramāṇe acintye aparimite yadāsīt |
S04n518:2: tena kālena tena samayena ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n518:3: sa khalu punaḥ kumāra ghoṣadattastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho aprameyānacintyānaparimāṇānasaṃkhyeyān sattvānāsravakṣayāyārhattve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃśca sattvānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve pratiṣṭhāpya parinirvṛto'bhūt |
S04n518:4: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena rājābhūcchrīghoṣo nāma |
S04n518:5: sa tasya tathāgatasya pūjārthaṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhāṇi caturaśītistūpakoṭisahasrāṇi kārayāmāsa |
S04n518:9: ihi hi kumāra sa rājā śrīghoṣastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā caturaśītyā bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrāṇāṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ kārayitvā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānena pūjāyāmudyukto'bhūt |
S04n518:10: sarve ca te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dharmabhāṇakā abhūvan anācchedyapratibhānāḥ samādhipratilabdhāḥ asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhūtaguṇadharmadeśakāḥ pariśuddhadharmadeśakāḥ bodhisattvavaśipāramiprāptāḥ |
S04n518:11: tena ca kumāra kālena tena samayena tatraiva parṣadi kṣemadatto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhūcchiśurdaharaḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamayauvanasamanvāgate bhadrake vayasi vartamānaḥ avikrīḍitāvī kāmeṣu kaumārabrahmacārī ekavarṣa upasaṃpadā |
S04n518:12: tena ca kumāra kālena tena ca samayena rāja śrīghoṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvamahāsattvagaṇamadhyeṣate sma yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃgītau |
S04n518:13: bodhisattvapiṭakamahādhāraṇyupāyakauśalyavaśivinayāsaṅgābhinirhārārthaṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānadhyeṣya rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ tatrānekāni dīpārdhyakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi prajvālitāni |
S04n518:17: mahatī ca devamānuṣikā pariṣat saṃnipatitā dharmaśravaṇārthikā |
S04n518:18: adrākṣīt kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsatvastāni ca mahānti dīpārdhyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃprajvalitāni |
S04n518:20: sadevamānuṣikāṃ ca janatāṃ dharmaśravaṇāya saṃnipatitāṃ viditvā tasyaitadabhūt-ahamapi mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ |
S04n518:22: yathārūpayā pūjayā sadevamānuṣāsuralokaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhaveddharmālokaprāptaḥ |
S04n518:23: imāṃ ca sarvāṃ tathāgatapūjāmabhibhaveyaṃ yeyaṃ śrīghoṣeṇa rājñā kṛtā |
S04n518:24: rājā ca śrīghoṣaścitrīkāraprāpto bhavedāttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ ||
S04n518:25: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattva evaṃcittaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃnipatitaṃ viditvā dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ rātrau saṃniṣaṇṇāyāṃ tathāgatacaityasya purataḥ sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ cīvarapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā tailaplutaṃ kṛtvā dīpayāmāsa |
S04n518:26: atha khalu kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paryeṣamāṇasya tathā pradīpte dakṣiṇe pāṇau nābhūt cittasya mukhavarṇasya vā anyathātvam |
S04n518:27: atha khalu kumāraḥ samanantarapradīpte kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pāṇau saṃprajvalite saṃjyotībhūte ekajvālāprāpte,
S04n518:28: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ prādurabhūt |
S04n518:29: tasya pāṇau dīpyamānasya prabhayā tānyanekāni dīpārdhyakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhyāmīkṛtānyabhūvan |
S04n518:31: yenāvabhāsena sarvā diśo'vabhāsitāḥ samantāt sphuṭā abhūvan |
S04n518:32: sa prītisaumanasyajāta imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaṃ samādhiṃ valgunā manorameṇa svareṇa viśiṣṭayā vācānuprabaddhaiḥ padavyañjanairvistareṇa sarvaparṣadaṃ vijñāpayan saṃprakāśayati sma |
S04n518:33: tatra dvādaśa sahasrāṇi trāyatriṃśatkāyikānāṃ devānāṃ saṃnipatitāni dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n518:36: adrākṣīdrājā śrīghoṣaḥ upariṣṭāt prāsādatalagataḥ svajanapuraskṛtaḥ antaḥpuramadhyagato'ṣṭāṅgapoṣadhasamādattaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhunāvabhāsayantaṃ sarvāḥ prabhā abhibhūya divyayā atikrāntamānuṣikayāvabhāsitam |
S04n518:37: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhūt-abhijñāprāpto batāyaṃ kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyatīti |
S04n518:38: sa tīvraṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ ca cipasthāpya saparivāro mahākuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhopastabdhaḥ sārdhamaśītyāntaḥpurikābhistataḥ prāsādatalādātmānamutprākṣipat yadut kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya darśanāya prītisaṃmodanāya |
S04n518:39: sa gauravanirjātena kuśalamūlena dṛṣṭa eva dharme saparivāro devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparigrahaṃ pratilabhate |
S04n518:40: sa devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparigṛhītaḥ punareva rājā śrīghoṣaḥ saparivāraḥ paripūrṇāddhastaśatasahasrikāt prāsādāt patitaḥ |
S04n518:41: na cāsya kāyaviheṭhaścittaviheṭho vā avalīnatā vābhūt ||
S04n518:42: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ ubhau bāhū pragṛhya mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamākrandraṃ cākārṣīt yaduta kṣemadattasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bāhuṃ dahyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃprajvalitam |
S04n518:43: sa rājā tena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ prārodīdaśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ ||
S04n518:44: atha khalu kṣemadatto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ rājānaṃ śrīghoṣamāmantrayate sma-kiṃ punasttvaṃ mahārāja anena mahatā janakāyena sārdhaṃ mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamākrandaṃ kurvan rodiṣi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi ?
S04n518:45: atha khalu rājā śrīghoṣaḥ kṣemadattaṃ bodhisattvaṃ gāthābhigītena prābhāṣata -
S04n518:50: yastvayā dīpito bāhuḥ prabhā muktā diśo daśa |
S04n518:52: prakampiteyaṃ pṛthivī cittaṃ te na ca līiyate |
S04n518:55: sārdhamantaḥpureṇeha na ca me kāyu hiṃsitaḥ || 5 ||
S04n518:57: sādhu vīryaṃ ca svārabdhaṃ sādhuṃ cādhyāśayo mahān || 6 ||
S04n518:58: yasya hastau vidahyante na jātvastīha iñjanā |
S04n518:60: pūrṇamāsyāṃ yathā candraḥ sūryo vāsau nabhastale |
S04n518:62: ahaṃ pi evaṃ praṇidhiṃ paripūreya paṇḍitaḥ |
S04n518:63: kāye premaṃ jahitvāhaṃ kuryāmarthaṃ ca prāṇinām || 9 ||
S04n518:65: yat puno aṅgahīno'si tena me duḥkhamuttamam || 10 ||
S04n518:69: sa tu devāṅgahīnaḥ syāda yasya śīlaṃ na vidyate || 12 ||
S04n518:74: astyeṣā laukikī pūjā anyā pūjā acintiyā |
S04n518:75: ye dharmān śūnyān jānanti tyajante kāyajīvitam || 15 ||
S04n518:77: yā ceyaṃ janatā sarvā imāṃ gāthāṃ vijānatha || 16 ||
S04n518:78: yena satyena buddho'haṃ bheṣye lokasya cetiyaḥ |
S04n518:80: bhāṣitā va iyaṃ vācā dharaṇī ca prakampitā |
S04n518:86: yena satyena dharmo'sau bāhurnāma na vidyate |
S04n518:87: tena satyena me bāhurbhoti kṣipraṃ yathā purā || 21 ||
S04n518:88: yena satyena dharmo'sau kṣemadatto na vidyate |
S04n518:90: yo'pi niścarate śabdastaṃ pu śūnyaṃ vijānatha |
S04n518:93: tasya satyena vākyena sarvaloko na dahyate ||24 ||
S04n518:94: yāvantastribhave sattvā ye devā ye ca mānuṣāḥ |
S04n518:96: yāvantyupadravāḥ kecid ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ |
S04n518:129: kāye prema na kurvīta iha dharme suśikṣitaḥ || 42 ||
